text: The Lighthouse is a 2019 Gothic horror psychological thriller movie directed and produced by Robert Eggers. It stars Willem Dafoe and Robert Pattinson. The movie is about nineteenth-century lighthouse keepers in trouble after being stuck at a remote New England lighthouse by a wild storm. ==References== Category:2010s psychological movies Category:2019 horror movies Category:2019 thriller movies Category:2010s horror thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Eggers Category:American psychological movies Category:American horror thriller movies
title: The Lighthouse (2019 movie)
